content: easy breezy neckwarmer finished size approximately 4 1/2 x 28 www hookedupcrochet com cathycrochets@hookedupcrochet com skill level easy yarn worsted weight 160 yards the pattern samples use malabrigo worsted in colorways curaçao and red mahogany hook j-10 6 0 mm notions two 7/8 buttons gauge 4 = 14 st and 10 row note about gauge if your gauge is not exact don t worry try adjusting the hook size or you can add or subtract row before the buttonhole row to compensate for vertical gauge if your horizontal gauge is not exact the fo will just be a little wider or thinner you could always add or subtract stitches in the row as desired abbr chain = chain half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet st = stitch single_crochet = single_crochet skip = skip instructions are written in u s crochet terms my deepest thanks to my wonderful pattern testers coribug krynne and quietdissident chain 15 row 1 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in each st turn 14 st row 2 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st turn 14 st repeat row 2 sixty-three 63 times row 66 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 3 st chain 1 skip 1 st half_double_crochet in each of next 6 st chain 1 skip 1 st half_double_crochet 3 turn repeat row 2 three 3 more times at end of the last row start a single_crochet border all the way around the piece end with a slip_stitch into first single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends copyright © 2010 by cathleen e corbitt-dipierro this pattern is for personal use only commercial or retail use is prohibited the pattern cannot be
